Hello People !!! Welcome To our Resto/Blog

Welcome Caji Resto/Blog , where culinary traditions around the world are found in a single place.

Colombia

These are some of the most traditional and famous food from Colombia everyone needs to try to get a real flavor of this popular country.

Mauritius

Mauritian cuisine is known to be a combination of African, Chinese, European and Indian influences. The majority of the recipes are inspired by the people who came to Mauritius during its colonial past.

Arepa

There is nothing more Colombian than the arepa. A circular bread made from fresh cornmeal, arepas are the foundations of many meals, and often times they’re eaten alone.

Bandeja Paisa

Colombia’s national dish, without a doubt, is the bandeja paisa. Reigning from the Antioquia region the bandeja paisa is a feast that is not for the faint-hearted.

Buñuelos

Another popular street food and an unmissable staple during the holiday months of November and December, buñuelos can best be described as fried dough balls that are somehow simultaneously sweet and savory.

Boulettes

Boulettes, also referred to as Mauritian Dim Sum, are steamed dumplings prepared using fish, minced meat, prawns, calamari or chayote, depending on the area.

Biryani

Biryani is a typical Indian dish popular in Mauritius, consisting of saffron rice along with an option of beef, chicken, or occasionally marinated fish.

The Bol Renversé

The Bol Renversé, also known as magic bowl, is a rice-based dish topped with a stir-fry sauce resembling Chinese chop suey.
